Stop-loss strategy: Trigger a sell order when DBR exceeds 65% or ROA falls below 6%
Sell when DBR exceeds 65% or EPS turns negative.
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price, or when the EPS turns negative.
Triggering a sell order when the stock price falls by 8% or more from the current price, and/or when the EPS turns negative.
Close below 80 NTD, or if EPS < -0.3, or if ROE < 15%
